Reviews.Title: “Far from city center, an expensive cab ride away”
Reviews.Author: Luv2travel122
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights. It was in december and the weather outside was cold, but the room stayed consistently hot! It was very uncomfortable, had to open the window and keep it open during the night. The room that we got was very small and old with a very tiny television. I would not stay here again because it is far from the center of the city.

HotelInfo.Name: Clarhotel
HotelInfo.Address: Largo Lorenzo Mossa 4, 00165 Rome, Italy
